text: "Is This Love?" is a 1986 song by English singer Alison Moyet and is the leading single from her second studio album Raindancing. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom and Norway, number 20 in Switzerland, number 7 in New Zealand, number 13 in Australia, number 12 in Finland, number 4 in Ireland, number 2 in South Africa and Portugal, number 19 in Italy, number 16 in the Netherlands and failed to chart in the United States and Canada. ==Track listings== 7-inch single # "Is This Love?" – 3:59 # "Blow Wind Blow" – 5:10 12-inch single # "Is This Love?" (L.A. mix) – 5:23 # "Is This Love?" (single version) – 3:59 # "Blow Wind Blow" (long version) – 6:19 12-inch single (UK release) # "Is This Love?" (L.A. mix) – 5:23 # "Blow Wind Blow" (long version) – 6:19 # "For You Only" (Europa mix) – 6:14 ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Alison Moyet songs
title: Is This Love? (Alison Moyet song)
